name: Tri-Pilot
description:
University of Northampton 3-day Game Jam project following the theme of "Patterns". Tri-Pilot is a procedural, arcade flyer, where the player must go on for as long as they can without being destroyed while the speed of gameplay continually ramps up.

This project was made by 6 developers including; 1 Programmer, 3 Designers and 2 Artists (Check credits page in-game for specifics)
